name: Time-Hog Day
description:
You are Jim, the "new" guy at the office. All you want to do is to sneak out of work early but the other employees always hold you up. Think you can get out?

A metal gear 1 inspired stealth game (enemies see in straight lines etc) made for Ludum Dare 47 for the theme stuck in a loop.

Known bugs: Footstep sounds do not work in web build.

Controls: WASD to move, C to crouch.

Credits:
Robert Mason - Made the Game

Wojtek Rak - Caught Sound

David Mason - Not the logo

HollowRiku, NightWatcher98, Simoneyoh - Royalty free sounds
